doc.field: Materials, other than correspondence, that could not be linked to a specific client relationship are in the Other Documents series. The material in this series dates from 1827 to 1861, with much of it undated. The series includes legal papers and financial records associated in all likelihood with the work of Green or Mitchell, though that role is not readily identifiable. Public notices of property sales (some with annotations made presumably by Mitchell) are found in this series. Three booklets of corporate Articles of Association, genealogical notes, schematics of building lots, a list of papers left by Mitchell with William Rice in South Carolina, legal research notes, two business cards, a newspaper clipping, and fragmentary reference notes are arranged in this order in a Research Notes folder. Document wrappers are foldered separately.
